Name: Botology
About the game: A company is currently in development of robots for the new generation - Botology, conduct tests for a new system for the remote control of robots. The purpose of the company is to help future potential buyers explore the remote space systems. The consciousness of the robot's operation is connected with a mechanical prototype of sensory organs. However, risky tests can and will lead to difficult, unforseen consequences.
Meta Title: Botology: Jun 24, 2015, Black Lime Studio and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Botology? Check out the release date (Jun 24, 2015), developer insights from Black Lime Studio, and a complete game summary.
